about.summary: Passionate Full Stack Web Developer with a love for creating intuitive and dynamic web applications. Experienced in ReactJS and Node.js as well as Java, .Net, and thrive in collaborative, Agile teams. Enthusiastic about coding, always eager to learn, and excited to contribute to impactful projects.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.desc: Collaborated with a team of developers to build a full features responsive web app using React and node.js server-side API with MySQL database. Worked on full stack web application using React for front side and node js for the backend and built fully functioning end to end Restful API using Express and frontend React js with responsive and elegant UI using HTML, CSS and styled components.

experience.title: IT Specialist & Software Developer
experience.desc: • Resolved technical issues both software and hardware by troubleshooting and diagnosing the problems. Built and maintained complex hardware infrastructure as well as local network and databases. Participated in a Software Development project using Java, and built a local software for managing some of the HR data and automation of some functionalities
